text.div:
Adverse Reaction Clinical Manifestation

https://healthterminologies.gov.au/fhir/ValueSet/adverse-reaction-clinical-manifestation-1

The Adverse Reaction Clinical Manifestation value set supports the recording of clinical manifestations of adverse reactions (including allergies and intolerances).

name: AdverseReactionClinicalManifestation
title: Adverse Reaction Clinical Manifestation
description: The Adverse Reaction Clinical Manifestation value set supports the recording of clinical manifestations of adverse reactions (including allergies and intolerances).
